Column.name: Template
Column.value: $COMMENT="Do not generate operations with the stereotype comment"

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
$bases=%ClassInherits% %if $bases != ""% $bases=" " + $bases %endIf% $generic=%list="ClassParameter" @separator=", "% %if $generic != ""% $generic="<" + $generic + ">" %endIf%
$annotations=%classTag:"annotations"% %REPLACE($annotations, "@", "\n @")%
%PI=" "% %CONVERT_SCOPE(classScope)% %classStereotype=="static" ? "static" : ""% %classIsLeaf == "T" ? "final" : ""%
%if elemType == "Interface"% %PI=""% %classStereotype=="annotation" ? "@"% interface %className%$generic$bases %endTemplate%
%classAbstract=="T" ? "abstract" : ""% %classStereotype=="enumeration" ? "enum" : "class"% %className%$generic$bases
%if genOptStmJavaUseNewTemplate == "T" and stmContextHasStatemachine == "T"% %if genOptStmJavaObjectOriented == "T"% implements StateMachineLib.BehavioredClassifier %else% implements StateMachineContext %endIf% %endIf%

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
%if classStereotype=="enumeration"% %if attStereotype=="enum" or attIsEnumLiteral=="T"% %PI=""% %attName% %attTag:"arguments" ? "(" value ")"% %endTemplate% %endIf%
%attTag:"Attribute"% %attTag:"annotations"% %PI=" "% %CONVERT_SCOPE(attScope)% %attStatic=="T" ? "static" : ""% %attConst=="T" ? "final" : ""% %attVolatile=="T" ? "volatile" : ""% %attTag:"transient"=="true" ? "transient" : ""%
%ConvertSqlType(attType)%
%PI=""% %attName% %if attCollection == "T" and attContainerType != ""% %attContainerType% %endIf% %attInitial ? " = " value% ;

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
$COMMENT="Convert SQL type to JAVA type" $COMMENT="Convert the SQL type of Postgres to the corresponding JAVA type"
$varType = $parameter1
%if $varType == ""% $ParamType = "int" %elseIf $varType == "bigint"% $ParamType = "long" %elseIf $varType == "varchar"% $ParamType = "String" %elseIf $varType == "decimal"% $ParamType = "double" %elseIf $varType == "double precisition"% $ParamType = "double" %else% $ParamType = $varType %endIf% $ParamType

Column.name: Template
Column.value: $COMMENT="Do not generate attribute with the tx-attribute comment"
